actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to relieve the Washoe County Water Conservation District, Nevada, of certain Federal repayment obligations.

summary.text: Relieves the Washoe County Water Conservation District, Nevada, from any repayment obligation to the United States in connection with emergency work performed at Boca Dam in 1965 and 1967.

titles.title: A bill to relieve the Washoe County Water Conservation District, Nevada, of certain Federal repayment obligations.
